xml.episodeInfo:
FUTURAMA
Episode 513
BEND HER
Mike Rowe Dave, The Neutral Planet
xml.info: Opening Credits. Caption: Too Hot For Radio.

Madison Cube Garden. It's Earth's 3004 Olympic Games (Plus Opening Act). Crowds cheer as an athlete carrying the Olympic torch runs up the steps to light the Olympic flame. He opens a hatch in the side, ignites the pilot light and turns the flame up like a hotplate. The crowds cheer.
Cut to: Madison Cube Garden Stands. Farnsworth, Fry, Leela, Amy, Bender and Zoidberg watch the games.
xml.speak: So who should I root for? America or one of those countries I learned about at the Food Court?
How 'bout those guys?
xml.info: On the track some people dressed in stripy jerseys and French berrets and carrying loaves of long bread wave to the crowd.
xml.speak: No, they're from the Republic Of French Stereotypes. Everybody hates them.
Oh, let's go check on Hermes. All this inspiring multi-culturalism is angrying up my blood. Sweden? I don't think so!
xml.info: He snatches the banner from them and rips it to shreads.
Madison Cube Garden Training Room. Hermes limbos under a limbo stick.
xml.speak: Go on stick, touch me! Can't do it!
xml.info: The limbo stick is about 5 and a half feet off the ground. The four crew members and LaBarbara are gathered around.
xml.speak: Husband, you haven't been an Olympic class limboer for 20 years! Quit lying to your podgy self.
It does seem like Jamaica will be able to field a strong limbo team without you.
Yeah, isn't that basically all Jamaicans do?
Jamaicans have other interests. Which is why the limbo team got detained at the airport.
That's when they begged my husband to step in and make an ass out of himself.
And I said I'd try my very best.
But have they seen your...y'know...physique, since the old days?
I described it to them on the phone, using a series of artful euphanisms.
xml.info: Farnsworth holds a red and blue jumpsuit.
xml.speak: Don't worry, the fat pig will do fine thanks to this flabbo-dynamic spandex bodysuit I've designed. It redistributes his weight, shifting his centre of gravity closer to his knees.
xml.info: The bodysuit contracts around Hermes' waist and his flab equals out underneath it.
xml.speak: Ooo, that's snug! Oh, those haven't descended in years.
Now that's a limboer's body!
xml.info: Everyone cheers.
xml.speak: You're that fine Jamaican bacon!
xml.info: Madison Cube Garden Stands. Bender and Zoidberg watch some competitors warm up on the field. All is quiet between the two.
xml.speak: Shut up Zoidberg, the robot bending events are starting! Something tells me I could easily beat those trained professionals.
xml.info: Cut to: Madison Cube Garden Field. A crane drops an unbendable girder into the hands of a robot. And another. The robot bends it around.
Cut to: Madison Cube Garden Stands. Bender gasps as he watches.
Cut to: Madison Cube Garden Field. The robot holds up the bent girders.
Cut to: Madison Cube Garden Stands.
xml.speak: Wow, that guy must have to be like the world's greatest bender. My dreams of glory died before they began.
Welcome to my life!
xml.info: He bursts into tears.
Cut to: Madison Cube Garden Track.
On the track the limboers warm up. A tall athlete takes his lane next to Hermes'.
xml.speak: Hermes Conrad. Is that you inside that dumpy little fat man?
xml.info: Hermes gasps.
xml.speak: Barbados Slim! What are you doing here? Last time I heard you were in Barbados.
Yes and I'll be going back there with a gold medal draped around my elegant Carribean shoulders.
xml.info: He laughs.
xml.speak: Your body may be as perfectly scultpted as it was 20 years ago when you whupped my fat ass every time we met......but today, I feel lucky.
xml.info: The hood squashes his hair flat and then into a rounded point.
xml.speak: I see you're still able to limbo under the bar of fashion sense!
xml.info: He laughs.
xml.speak: That's it Barbados Slim, you've gone one talk over the line!
Limboers, on your marks, get rubbery......limbo!
xml.info: He shoots the starter gun and the limboers run off down the track and under the limbo sticks.
xml.speak: (voice-over) There they go, and Barbados Slim takes an early lead. God I hope he wins. What's this? Hermes Conrad is closing the gap. He's limboed out of retirement and straight into my heart. I say go to hell Barbados Slim!
xml.info: Cut to: Madison Cube Garden Stands. The crew and LaBarbara watch and cheer and hold up a banner reading "You The Mon."
xml.speak: (shouting) Go bodysuit, go!
(shouting) Go!
(shouting) C'mon!
(shouting) C'mon Hermes, beat that mahogany god!
xml.info: Cut to: Madison Cube Garden Track. Hermes closes in on Barbados Slim as they approach the last limbo stick.
xml.speak: (voice-over) It's Barbados, then Conrad. Conrad pulls ahead! And Conrad is disqualified! Barbados Slim, my hero, takes the gold!
xml.info: LaBarbara runs to Hermes' side.
xml.speak: Aww, there there Hermes. You did your best! If I'd wanted a human Adonis for a husband, I'd have stayed married to Barbados Slim.
xml.info: Cut to: Madison Cube Garden Stands. Disappointed, the crew sit down.
xml.speak: Well enough about Hermes, I couldn't win a medal either. Even at bending - the thing I was built to do. I'm so embarassed. I wish everybody else was dead.
Up next, the Fembot bending competition.
xml.info: On the field Fembots bend coathangers.
xml.speak: Fembots? Methinks a clever Manbot suitably disguised might win those events! But the charade would require subtlety, nuance, grace.
What do you mean I'm not registered? My name is Coilette and I'm from, uh...Robonia! Coilette's a chick's name!
Yes but "Robonia" sounds like something somebody made up on the spot.
Ever been beaten up by a guy dressed like a chick?
xml.info: The official squirms and hands Bender a card.

Madison Cube Garden Field. "Coilette" the Fembot from the Grand Duchy Of Robonia prepares for the competition. A whistle blows. Bender bends a bent girder. A man puts a protractor to it and gives a thumbs up.
xml.speak: And it's straight! Coilette wins!
xml.info: Time Lapse. Bender has now entered the javelin event. He runs with the javelin, stops, bends it, throws it and watches it fly across the field. It is the farthest thrown.
xml.speak: Another gold medal for the spunky maid from Robonia.
xml.info: Time Lapse. In what looks to be a diving competition Bender stands at the end of a girder shaped diving board. The beeper beeps and he dives off the end, grabs the girder and bends it as he falls.
xml.speak: A perfect bend and a flawless entry. No splash at all! Perfect scores, a record five gold medals for Coilette!
xml.info: Bender flips onto his feet and cheers.
xml.speak: I'm great! Everybody else sucks, except that guy Bender, he's really somethin'!
xml.info: He cheers.
Bender screams.
Madison Cube Garden Tunnel. Farnsworth, Fry, Leela and Amy stand around the still disguised Bender.
xml.speak: You actually thought they'd let you walk away without an engine oil sex check?
(crying) Oh God, I'm not gonna get my medals! They're all I have to remember my Olympic career. Wait, I've got it! Professor, make a woman out of me!
Oh I think we should just stay friends.
xml.info: He pats Bender's hand.
xml.speak: I don't need friends, I need a sex change operation and give it to me now!

Bender a robot sex change is a complex and dangerous procedure. Replacing your testosteroil with Fembot lubricants can cause wild mood swings. And the effects may be irreversible. Well let's get started!
No, you can't!
If you have even the slightest respect for the dignity of women -
Pfft.
I'm sorry ladies but I must do this. Not for you, not for Bender, but for the proud people of Robonia!
xml.info: Outside Robot Medical Tent. Three robots line up outside for treatment. One has been impaled on a fencing sword, another has been impaled with five javelins and another has been impaled on a tennis racket. Bender holds up the side of the tent and ushers Farnsworth, Fry and Leela inside. He gets impatient.
xml.speak: (whispering) C'mon!
xml.info: Cut to: Robot Medical Tent. Bender lies down on an operating table.
xml.speak: I can't watch this 'cause it's creepy and wrong and sick. However I will watch out of curiosity.
(shouting) Quiet! (talking) I'm about to begin the process of reshaping Bender's body into a tender delicate form.
xml.info: He starts hitting Bender's casing with a sledgehammer. His shadow is cast on the wall and Bender cries out in pain.
Time Lapse. Farnsworth jacks Bender's head up. He puts a spanner between Bender's legs.
xml.speak: (dramatically) Draining male oil. Infusing female oil. Removing item.
xml.info: He holds the shears around Bender's antenna. Fry ringes as Bender's antenna is snipped off.
Robot Gender Testing. A robot and a Fembot wait for Coilette.
xml.speak: We can't wait for Coilette any longer dammit. I have to get home to watch The Zombie Osbournes.
xml.info: A curtain draws back and Coilette walks out of the Robot Medical Tent.
xml.speak: I'm ready for my test now boys.
xml.info: The robots' jaws drop - off.

Madison Cube Garden Field. The winner's podiums have been set up and Coilette stands wearing five gold medals. She looks like your run of the mill ordinary trannybot. Brown hair, slim figure, alarming amount of lipstick. She sings the Robonian national anthem.
xml.speak: (singing) Hail, hail Robonia, a land I didn't make up!
xml.info: The crowd cheers and bouquets of flowers are thrown.
Planet Express: Lounge. The crew watch Coilette cheering on the podium. She does a victory dance and takes her top off.
xml.speak: ON TV Ooo yeah c'mon baby boom!
Oh yeah baby c'mon! Work your can! That's it shake it out!
I don't know which I'm more, enraged or disgusted!
I'm just out there making us ladies look good.
Snuh-uh! You're making us look like jerks in front of the other genders.
But you're not really a lady anyway. Right?
xml.info: He puts a glass of water on the table.
xml.speak: Of course not.
xml.info: She puts Fry's glass on a coaster.
xml.speak: Dear Lord, a coaster! The Femzoil must be sacheting girlishly into your processor.

Then change me back. My breasts are keeping me awake at night anyway. Hello...? What...? A guest spot on Late Night With Humorbot 5.0...? I'd love to! My own limo...? No I don't have my own limo. You'd better send one. I need a raincheck on that nad-swap Professor. I'm going on TV. C'mon Fry help me pick out a pantsuit!
xml.info: Late Night With Humorbot 5.0 Studio. The studio looks like the studio for The Tonight Show With Jay Leno. The audience are all robots. Humorbot 5.0 speaks with his usual mechanical voice and interviews a popular soap star.
xml.speak: .0 So Calculon, do you want to set up this clip from All My Circuits?
No I think it's self-explanatory.
xml.info: A screen comes up behind them and they turn to face it. On the screen a pirate barbecues some stuff and Calculon gives a dramatic performance.
In the studio the audience applaud and stop instantly.
xml.speak: Funny story, the script called for me to say "yes" but I gave it a little twist.

.0 Anecdote accepted. Snappy comeback not found. Please put your hands together for my next guest. Winner of five Olympic medals - Coilette from Robonia. So Coilette, many young Fembot's wish to emulate you. Any advice for them?

Yes Humorbot. If you ask me, women today are too stuck up to go out and jiggle their jello like everybody wants them to. In fact, should I do it now? Alright then! Woo! Look out baby! Work it out! Oo shake that thing! You gotta use it lady! Shake it up a little! Look at that! C'mon! Work it out!
xml.info: The audience cheers and Calculon is impressed.
xml.speak: Madam, I am one impressed celebrity.
Oh I bet you say that to all the five Olympic gold medal winning Fembots!
(sexfully) From this day forward I shall do so whenever possible.
Golly...what?
Coilette this may be presumtuous....
That's my favourite kind of this!
...but I would be honoured if you would join me for dinner sometime.
xml.info: The audience hoot.
xml.speak: Calculon. You'd be fulfilling this naive Robonian farmgirl's fantasy!
Of course I would.
xml.info: Planet Express: Locker Area. Coilette stands in front of a locker admiring herself in a mirror. She is dressed in pink Fembot clothes. The crew are gathered around.
xml.speak: This top makes me look fat. Is it trampy to go on a first date nude?
Yes.
Perfect.
xml.info: She takes the top off.
xml.speak: You gotta tell me. You're not actually attracted to Calculon right? And if you are don't tell me. Are you?
Certainly not. But just once I'd like to eat dinner with a celebrity who isn't bound and gagged. Is that so much to ask?
Well I think you dating a Manbot is a disgrace. And I refuse to be involved. And you have way too much lipstick on.
xml.info: Amy nods.
xml.speak: Are you kidding? I need more lipstick! Much more! Ooo yeah that's the stuff! Men love it when you really glob it on!
No they don't.
No way!
Oh please. Every man wants a tramp! No wonder you girls aren't married! I tell you, men are so much better at being women.
xml.info: She puts some earrings on using a nailgun.
xml.speak: But what if he wants to, I mean if he tries to...uh...Barry White?
I'll just tell him I needed commitment first. That'll stick a potato in his tailpipe!
Good Lord man what kind of temporary woman are you?
Look, why don't all of you just back off? Can't a girl enjoy herself without being judged?
xml.info: She takes her handbag, slams the locker door and storms off.
xml.speak: Oh dear. Her mood swings are getting wilder. She's becoming a slave to her emotions. Just like all women, particularly you Leela.
xml.info: She slaps him.
xml.speak: I'm worried about him too Professor.
xml.info: Elzar's Fine Cuisine. Tonight's special is leg of salmon. Coilette chomps her way through a leg.
xml.speak: Hey ma'am, you sure can put it away! You saved me a trip to the dump! Bam!
I'd appreciate it if you didn't bam the young lady.
Well, I'd appreciate it if I did, so I guess we're even.
xml.info: He leaves.
xml.speak: You know Coilette, I've never before met a woman as fascinating as I am. You're such a sweet, soft Fembot. And you have this free spirit about you. And there it is. It's as if you understand the male mind better than I! I've never met anyone like you.
Oh yes you have.
Coilette. I'd like to spend some (whispering) quality time with you.
What? Ahh! Whoa, no way! Not gonna happen. What kind of girl do you think I am?
Have I mentioned that I own the world's biggest and most elegant yacht?
xml.info: Coilette's eyes light up.

Montage Coilette and Calculon date to Tom Jones' She's A Lady. They enjoy a trip on his yacht Calculon's Pride which sails on a pool on an even larger yacht called Calculon's Talent. They dance under a mirrorball. Calculon swings Coilette around and her arms extend and she knocks all the other robots over. They sit in an oil hot tub and their photo appears on the cover Famous Actor And Athlete Couples Illustrated magazine.
Planet Express: Lounge. The crew feed scraps to a begging Zoidberg. Enter Coilette.
xml.speak: Woo! I'm a trophy girlfriend!
No kidding. These gifts have been coming non-stop! I think Calculon's falling for you.
xml.info: The puppies bark and Coilette throws her hat down and puts her coat over the top of them.
xml.speak: Bah. Any day now he'll dump me for a new wad of arm candy. And then I can turn back into a guy and hock all this stuff! It's just a game.
xml.info: Amy and Leela glare at him. Enter Calculon via the wall.
xml.speak: Coilette, I can't stop thinking about you. I can't sleep at night - although as a robot I don't do that anyway. But if I did I couldn't because I love you so. Oh my darling......Will you marry me?
xml.info: Coilette looks up at the gobsmacked crew.
xml.speak: Oh Calculon, yes I will!
xml.info: Calculon puts the ring on her finger. Amy nudges Leela.
xml.speak: (whispering) Maybe she's right about the lipstick.
xml.info: Time Lapse. Calculon is gone and Coilette is preparing to leave.
xml.speak: I'll miss you buddy. You've been like a brother and then a sister to me. And now you're getting married. I love you.
The marriage is a scam.
Cool. What's for dinner?
What do you mean a scam?
I marry Calculon, divorce him, take half his money and turn back into a guy. It's sort of a two-person pyramid scheme.
That's marriage alright!
That is so unbelievably manipulative.
Come on, you never went on a date with a guy just 'cause you were hungry?
Well I...uh...I thought I might like him on a full stomach.
Nice try sister. Now if you'll excuse me, I need to meet with my wedding planner. (shouting) Zoidberg. (talking) Zoidypoo, please tell me frilly is in this year.
xml.info: Zoidberg flips through a catalogue.
xml.speak: I saw a frilly cake in here you would remember all your life. I know I will. Late at night it haunts me with it's frosted beauty. (shouting) Order the cake dammit!
xml.info: Hot Air Balloon. Calculon and Coilette enjoy a day together.
xml.speak: I have something for you.
xml.info: He hands her a remote control.
xml.speak: A remote control? You got me a TV?
No my dearest, it's the remote control to my heart! It symbolises the power you have to sway my emotions.
Will it work on my TV?
We don't need TVs, we have each other! Coilette if I weren't able to spend my life with you I would leap from this very balloon.
Come on now - really?
Yes! We were meant (dramatically) to be!
So...you really and truly love me?
So much so that I'm prepared to give up showbusiness itself to be with you!
xml.info: Coilette gasps.
xml.speak: But, you always said you'd rather burn down a convent than give up showbusiness.
I always said many things. But now all I want is a peaceful life and a quiet villa overlooking a vineyard....with you.
xml.info: Coilette starts to cry.
xml.speak: (crying) Would we have donkeys?
All you can eat!
xml.info: She hugs him.
xml.speak: (crying) Oh take me in your arms and compress me. Compress me tight!
Stop! Let us climb to the heavens that the gods themselves might embrace!
xml.info: He picks up Boxy and throws him out of the balloon. The balloon climbs into the sky.
Planet Express: Lounge. Coilette sits at the table crying. The crew are sat around.
xml.speak: (crying) I just don't think I can go through with this scam.
xml.info: The crew gasp.
xml.speak: What?
So now you do wanna marry him?
(crying) No, I just don't wanna hurt him, or humiliate him. Oh, curse this woman's heart!
xml.info: She cries more.
xml.speak: Eck!
You're falling into the final debilitating stages of womanhood. You've waited too long to switch back you dingbat!
OK look. If I help you with this do you promise to get out of my gender and stay out?
(crying) Uh-huh.
Alright. Now there's no way to stop this marriage without hurting Calculon. But he's an actor. If there's one kind of pain he can handle, it's soap opera pain.
xml.info: Outside Church. Above the church doors is a banner reading "Celebrity Wedding. Ordinary People Not Invited." Farnsworth walks Coilette up the aisle and a little robot carries her train. At the back of the crowd are Fry, Hermes, Amy, Zoidberg and Leela. Fry is dressed in a hat and sleeveless jacket, Zoidberg is kitted out in medical scrubs and Leela wears a blonde wig and a dress. She puts a sunglass over her eye.
xml.speak: (whispering) OK, is everyone ready?
Yep.
Uh-huh.
Check!
Impassively.
xml.info: They split and Zoidberg scuttles off and woops. At the front the ceremony begins.
xml.speak: Dearly beloved actors and casting people who may be looking for somebody to play a preacher, I welcome you! The bride has written some vows that we will now all pretend to be interested in.
xml.info: Coilette and Calculon turn to each other.
xml.speak: Dearest Calculon. Forever is not enough time to tell you of the many ways I love you.
xml.info: She faints theatrically. The crowd gasps.
xml.speak: Oh my!
Is there a doctor in the -
I came as soon as I could. It appears to be a case of African Hydraulic Fever!
Dear God! The very illness my TV character caught in season two, when I was holding out for more money! It's often fatal.
Whatever happens, remember, the flame of my eternal love will burn forever.
Of course. But smoochiepups, I thought one could only catch hydraulic fever deep in the diamond mines of the Congo.
xml.info: Leela calls out from the crowd.
xml.speak: Coilette! You she-devil! You really thought you could steal those diamonds from me and Congo Jack?
xml.info: Coilette stands up.
xml.speak: Those gems belong to the natives!
xml.info: Leela kicks Coilette in the face and Amy restrains her.
xml.speak: Oh how cruel and melodramatic fate is. (dramatically shouting) Whhhy?
Calculon, my darling, your loud "why" brought me partway back to life. Congo Jack!
Another shocking twist!
xml.info: Hermes plays some shocking twist music.
xml.speak: Yes. And I have a message for you from Colonel Mitumba! He says this......is from Congo Jack.
xml.info: He throws the spear. It hits a flower pot.
xml.speak: Uh, um...
xml.info: She takes it out of the flower pot and tucks it under her arm, screams, and falls over.
xml.speak: No! Nooo! (dramamtically shouting) N-O-O-O!
I won't leave you. Not until I'm sure you understand the thing I said before. About my eternal love for you burning......et cetera.
(crying) I do. I do.
OK then.
xml.info: She dies in a very dramatic and soapy way. At the back Zoidberg eats what is left of the buffet.
xml.speak: EATING I'm a doctor, she's dead.

She lives no more. But let us all find comfort knowing that she truly loved me. To honour my pain, I shall star in a film dedicated to her memory. And this time the Academy will not deny me. Not when they see Coilette: A Calculon Story.
xml.info: Planet Express: Farnsworth's Lab. The crew watch Calculon's film on TV. The Coilette character is lying dead with Calculon at her side. In the background Preacherbot waves.
xml.speak: ON TV Coilette. Your death fills me wih sorrow, (angry) anger, (fearful) fear, (normal) every emotion an actor can display.
xml.info: Farnsworth files away the last bit of hair from Coilette's head.
xml.speak: Turn off that crap-o-rama! One mistake now and Bender will be trapped forever between the already ill-defined robot sexes.
xml.info: He chisels something between Coilette's legs.
xml.speak: Ow, oo, ow.
Well Bender, I hope this has taught you a lesson about changing your sex to win five gold medals.
It truly has. My romance with Calculon has shown me a lot about myself.
Almost done.
If only somehow, someway he and I could...
xml.info: Bender's antenna springs up.
xml.speak: ...drive to Vegas, pick up some Flooziebots and void their warranties all night long!
xml.info: He sits up and cheers.
xml.speak: Yay my buddy's home! And his respect for women is back to normal.
I kind of hope this whole experience would have left you a little more open to your sensitive side.
Yeah you'd think but what you gonna do?
xml.info: He takes a puff from a cigar. On the TV it is raining and Calculon holds Coilette in his arms..
xml.speak: ON TV Coilette, the skies themselves weep upon the sweetest flower of all the field.
Aww!
Aww!
Eww!
Gross.
Sentimental drivel-poop.
xml.info: Zoidberg, Farnsworth and Hermes leave.
xml.speak: C'mon Bender let's go. This chick flick is getting me all barfy.
Yeah. Emotions are dumb and should be hated.
xml.info: Fry leaves and he starts out after him. He stops and looks at the TV.
xml.speak: ON TV Goodnight Coilette, my turtledove.
xml.info: Bender's eyes well up with tears.
xml.speak: Goodnight Calculon.
xml.info: Amy and Leela turn around.
xml.speak: What did you say?
I said you two don't dress trampy enough. I still got it!
xml.info: He twangs his antenna.
THE END
